Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).<br><br>【Penalty】<br>All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).
